<title level="1" right="Hazard 18" pfs="">[Luminous Ward](/Hazards.aspx?ID=85)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 58</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A burst of radiance explodes from the door.

---

**Stealth**
DC 40 (master)

**Disable**
[Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) DC 40 (master) to disable the wards or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (9th level; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC 38) to counteract the ward

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Radiant Explosion** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) **Trigger** A creature touches the door; **Effect** All creatures within 20 feet of the door are scorched with brilliant light, taking 20d6 fire damage (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 hour (or permanently on a critical failure).

---
**Reset**
The trap resets after 1 hour.
